<title level="1" right="Rules">[Modifiers and AC](/Rules.aspx?ID=2122)</title>

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 212 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
For Perception, Acrobatics, and Stealth, you can have your familiar use your spellcasting attribute modifier + your level instead of 3 + your level if it’s higher.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
